verses.roman:
tabe saba bhakta lañā karilā bhojana
govindere ājñā dilā kari' ācamana

synonyms: tabe—then; saba bhakta lañā—with all the devotees; karilā bhojana—took lunch; govindere—unto Govinda; ājñā dilā—gave the order; kari' ācamana—after washing His hands and mouth.
translation: The Lord ate lunch in the company of all the other devotees, and after washing His hands and mouth He gave an order to Govinda.
